==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|びょう|がく|yomi=o}}
Compound of {{compound|猫|tr1=byō|t1=cat|額|tr2=gaku|t2=forehead|lang=ja|sort=ひょうがく'}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|びょうがく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|びょうがく|hhira=べうがく}}

# [[cat]]'s [[forehead]], [[smallness]] as that of a cat's forehead

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|ねこ|ひたい|k2=びたい|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{compound|猫|tr1=neko|t1=cat|額|tr2=hitai|t2=forehead|lang=ja|sort=ねこびたい}}. {{rendaku2|hitai|bitai|sort=ねこびたい}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ねこびたい|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ねこびたい|hhira=ねこびたひ}}

# [[smallness]]
